Mel Gibson stars as a chauvinistic ad exec who suddenly gains the ability to hear women's thoughts - it's a hilarious and heartwarming film that explores what men might really think if they could read our minds!

Based on your interest in "Downfall" and its themes of complexity and intrigue, I'd recommend checking out "This Is Spinal Tap". Like "Downfall", it's a film that delves into the complexities of human relationships and explores what happens when characters are pushed to their limits. With its witty humor and memorable performances, you'll find yourself laughing and nodding along with this cult classic.

If you're looking for something a bit more...morbid, I'd suggest "The Trouble with Harry". This classic thriller has all the makings of a gripping mystery: a dead body, a cast of suspicious characters, and a whole lot of twists and turns. With its clever writing and sharp direction, this one's sure to keep you on the edge of your seat!
